content: As an AI language model, I am not capable of having personal preferences. However, I can tell you that Michael Jackson's music has certainly stood the test of time. His ability to blend different genres of music and create catchy, danceable tracks has made his music popular across generations. Additionally, his unique voice, along with his iconic dance moves, has helped him earn his place as one of the greatest entertainers of all time. His music continues to inspire and influence artists today, proving that his legacy is still very much relevant in the contemporary music scene.
